Package maldiniPaone.databaseConnection

Class ReportAndAssignmentUpdater

java.lang.Object
maldiniPaone.databaseConnection.ReportAndAssignmentUpdater
public class ReportAndAssignmentUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains protected static methods which are used to update data about reports and assignments. Those methods checks parameters values to check data validity and avoid inconsistent data. All methods may throw exceptions if database can't be reached or parameters are not valid. The actual communication with the database happens in ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector.
See Also:
ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector

  • Constructor Details

    • ReportAndAssignmentUpdater

      public ReportAndAssignmentUpdater()

  • Method Details

    • addReport

      protected static java.lang.Integer[] addReport​(java.lang.String username, java.sql.Timestamp time, Location location, java.lang.String note, java.lang.String licensePlate) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the method inside ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector which adds a report to the database Checks the parameter validity to avoid meaningless connections to the database.
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user who makes the report
      time - : the timestamp corresponding to the report
      location - : the location of the report
      note - : possible notes added by user
      licensePlate - : the license plate in the report in String form
      Returns:
      boolean : true if insertion is successful false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • updateAssignment

      protected static boolean updateAssignment​(java.lang.Integer id, java.lang.String username, ViolationType type, State newState) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the method inside ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector which updates a report's state Checks the parameter validity to avoid meaningless connections to the database.
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user who is modifying the state
      type - :the type of the violation
      id - : the id of the assignment to be modified
      newState - : the new state of the assignment
      Returns:
      boolean : true if update is successful false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • AddSuggestions

      protected static boolean AddSuggestions​(java.lang.String suggestion, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String province) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the method inside ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector which adds a suggestion Checks the parameter validity to avoid meaningless connections to the database.
      Parameters:
      suggestion - : String containing the text of the suggestion
      name - : the name of the cityhall to which the suggestion is related
      province - : the new state of the assignment
      Returns:
      boolean : true if insertion is successful false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • addNewPhoto

      public static boolean addNewPhoto​(java.lang.String name, int reportId) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the method inside ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector which adds a photo
      Parameters:
      name - : the name of the photo
      reportId - : the id of the report to which the photo must be associated
      Returns:
      boolean : true if insertion is successful false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)
